trial_identification.studytitle: Development of an instrument for assessment of expectations of new hearing aid users.
trial_identification.scientifictitle: Development of an instrument for assessment of expectations of new hearing aid users, using test-retest approach.

conditions.healthcondition: Development of an instrument enabling the measurement of expectations of the patient candidate for hearing aids.

interventions.interventions: Application and reapplication of the instrument (questionnaire) in the same group of adults and elderly, with an interval of 7 days between first and last application. The questionnaire consists of 12 questions with issues closed and 3 alternatives of response. It takes aproximately 10 minutes to complete.

primaryOutcome.outcome: The instrument proved be reliable for evaluating the expectation of the new hearing aids user, using the Kappa Coeficient.
primaryOutcome.timepoint: Application and reapplication 7 days after the first.

eligibility.inclusivecriteria: People over 18 years old, with hearing loss of mild to moderately-severe and no experience with hearing aids.
eligibility.exclusivecriteria: People under 18 years old, with severe or profound bilateral hearing loss and that had any prior experience with hearing aids.
